channel.title: Google on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Luca Berton's Website, Blog and all the Cool Stuff. Web is my playground!

item.title: Mobile Web Specialist Nanodegree
item.description: I was selected for a full 6-month Mobile Web Specialist Nanodegree - Google Developer Scholarship EMEA program (1.000 seats) after 3 months of Google Developer Challenge (10.000 seats). Excited about this opportunity! Thank you Udacity & Google

item.title: Kubernetes contributions
item.description: I’ve been started my contribution to Kubernetes project (Production-Grade Container Orchestration). My Italian translation is part of the release 1.8 (details on pull request).
